newsitem.title: ITALY: MOTOR RACING-FAST TIME FOR SCHUMACHER ON TEST TRACK.
newsitem.headline: MOTOR RACING-FAST TIME FOR SCHUMACHER ON TEST TRACK.

text.p: Michael Schumacher set an unofficial track record at Ferrari's private Fiorano circuit in a tyre and brake testing session on Friday.
The German former Formula One world champion put in 71 laps with a fastest time of 59.54 seconds, inside the previous best of 59.77 set by Briton Eddie Irvine last year.
Driving a Ferrari with the same engine as that used in this month's Australian Grand Prix, where he finished second, Schumacher tested two types of tyres and appeared satisfied.
"I'm happy, these tests went in the right direction for the development of the car. I am also very satisfied with the tyre tests," he told reporters afterwards.
